headline.main: RED ARMY TIGHTENS NET IN NORTHWEST; Break in Nazis' Smolensk Line Reported -- Thaw in Ukraine Fails to Halt Timoshenko RED ARMY TIGHTENS NET IN NORTHWEST

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, March 1 -- Soviet forces drawing an ever-tighter noose about the shattered Sixteenth German Army now are within sight of Staraya Russa, keystone of all German communications on the northwestern front below Leningrad, front-line dispatches said tonight.
